bug.author: mihahauke
bug.summary: setConsoleEnabled(false) doesn't disable some initialization output
bug.description: ViziaZDoom ZDOOM 2.8pre VIZIA 1.0 - - SDL version Compiled on Jan 22 2016 M_LoadDefaults: Load system defaults. Gameinfo scan took 0 ms W_Init: Init WADfiles. adding /home/ebony/vizia/bin/viziazdoom.pk3, 582 lumps adding ../scenarios/doom2.wad, 2919 lumps adding ../scenarios/health_guided.wad, 7 lumps vizia_controlled is write protected. vizia_instance_id is write protected. Vizia_ScreenInit: width: 60, height: 45, pitch: 60, format: CRCGCB
